      • setJettyLogLevel

        public static void setJettyLogLevel​(java.lang.String level)
        Set log level of embedded Jetty. Call prior to start of server.
        Parameters:
        level - one of the Jetty log levels DEBUG, INFO, WARN, or OFF

      • getParameter

        public static java.lang.String getParameter​(spark.Request request,
                                            java.lang.String key,
                                            java.lang.String... defaultVal)
        Get parameters encoded in request body
        Parameters:
        request - Request
        key - Parameter name
        defaultVal - Optional default value to be returned if the parameter is not present
        Returns:
        Value of parameter or provided default value

      • checkParameter

        public static boolean checkParameter​(spark.Request request,
                                     java.lang.String key,
                                     boolean... defaultVal)
        Check for presence of parameters encoded in request body
        Parameters:
        request - Request
        key - Parameter name
        defaultVal - Default value to be returned if the parameter is not present
        Returns:
        Presence of parameter default value (false, if not provided)

      • parseMultipartRequest

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.String>> parseMultipartRequest​(spark.Request request,
                                                                                                           java.lang.String filePart,
                                                                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> formFields,
                                                                                                           java.lang.String storagePath)
        Extract names/values of all request parts (file and form fields), store contained files to disk
        Parameters:
        request - request of type multipart
        filePart - name of parts from which files shall be extracted. If empty string, all file parts will be extracted
        formFields - will contain the key-value pairs of all form field request parts
        storagePath - path for temporary storage of transmitted files
        Returns:
        map of file parts and associated lists of file names, if parameter filePart is non-empty String only of part with this name

        public static java.lang.String wrapResponse​(java.lang.String text)
